page.title: 13TRANSPORT IN NORTH YATE
page.content: Most pepole who live in the North Yate area own a medium-sized family car.Some people have two cars.A few people have another vehicle, for example a lorry,and most families have some bicycles.Not many people are completely satisfied with the local roads.One complaint is that they are full of pot-holes and repairs are not done quickly enough.Another worry is the large lorries that have to use the small roads.Some people would like to see lower speed limits and others would be pleased to see some cycle paths.The public transport in the area consists solely of an occasional bus service.Almost every family in the area has their own private car, and not many people have cause to use the buses.There is a disused station and railway line, which quite a few people think should be reopened.
